summary: The discovery of life on Mars places a robotic expedition and a manned mission in a race to the Red Planet. On the way we discover that love - biological, spiritual, and even mechanical - can flourish in all kinds of ways.
cast: Mark Duplass|Zoë Simpson Dean|Paul Gordon|Cynthia Watros|Michael Dolan|Howe Gelb|Liza Weil|James Kochalka|Kinky Friedman|Charissa Allen|Elena Araoz|Nicole Atkins|Javier Bonafont|Kathy Rose Center|Sunhee Cho|Kevin Cox|Don Hertzfeldt|Robert Howell|Jonna Juul-Hansen|Nicholas Koller|Jack Lee|Berndt Mader|Amber Marslett|Geoff Marslett|Dave Mikol|Spencer Parsons|Brandi Jo Perkins|Garry Peters|Jeremy Pollet|Morgan Prine|Jean Oliver Tchouaffe|Iskra Valtcheva|Melanie West
title: Mars
